Class HandEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • HandEvaluator

  • public class HandEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    (c) 2012 Bohde Productions Inc. All Rights Reserved. This static class is used to evaluate a users hand. Intended to be used in Texas Hold Em.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<Card> hand
      The hand of seven cards to be evaluated
      private static int handValue
      The value of the hand, to be used to rank and compare to other hands

      Constructor and Description
      HandEvaluator()

    • Constructor Detail

      • HandEvaluator

        public HandEvaluator()

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public static int evaluate(java.util.ArrayList<Card> temp,
           Card c1,
           Card c2)
        Finds the best poker hand out of seven cards. Written for use in TexasHoldEm.
        Parameters:
        temp - should be the river of the current game of Texas Hold Em
        c1 - should be the users first dealt card
        c2 - should be the users second dealt card
        Returns:
        An integer value representing the value of the hand. These integers represent:
        • 0 - UNDEFINED
        • 1 - Pair
        • 2 - Two Pairs
        • 3 - Three of a Kind
        • 4 - Straight
        • 5 - Flush
        • 6 - Full House
        • 7 - Four of a Kind
        • 8 - Straight Flush

      • makeHand

        private static void makeHand(java.util.ArrayList<Card> h,
            Card c1,
            Card c2)
        Forms a single, seven card hand out of the parameters.
        Parameters:
        h - should be the river in the game of Texas Hold Em
        c1 - should be the first card of the dealt hand being evaluated
        c2 - should be the second card of the dealt hand being evaluated

      • destroy

        private static void destroy()
        Clears all variables so that evaluate(ArrayList, Card, Card) can be used repeatedly, safely.

      • sort

        private static void sort()
        Uses an insertion sort algorithm to sort the hand produced by makeHand(ArrayList, Card, Card) in ascending order for ease of evaluating.
        See Also:
        makeHand(ArrayList, Card, Card)

      • isPair

        private static boolean isPair()
        Checks for a pair. Intended only for use in evaluate(ArrayList, Card, Card).
        Returns:
        true if a pair is found, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        evaluate(ArrayList, Card, Card)
